name: Lights, Camera, Competence
description:
Lights, Camera, Competence

You are the director of an upcoming blockbuster action flick. The only problem is that your audience has a very short attention span. Made for and submitted to the 2021 GMTK Game Jam.

Controls

Move the mouse to move the protagonist across the screen.

Use the mouse wheel to zoom the virtual camera in and out.

Press left click to flash your camera.

Hold right click to have your protagonist stop accelerating.

That's it!

Credit

I made all of the art and code.

I made sounds using ChipTone by SFB Games.

The one song in the game is "Jarvic 8" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com).

Thanks to my family for helping to playtest.

If you're (somehow) interested in looking at the code for this game, here's the repository: https://github.com/ambiguousname/GMTKGameJam2021
